title: Provides that a child shall not be placed with the office of children and family services at the conclusion of a dispositional hearing unless the court finds that di
summary: Provides that a child shall not be placed in the custody of the office of children and family services at the conclusion of a dispositional hearing unless the court finds that conditional discharge would not be appropriate and that the respondent poses a significant threat to public safety.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, in relation to orders of disposition
